title.narrative: Promoting UK-China film collaborations that will build capacity in the Chinese TV industry and supporting the internationalisation of China's film industry, thereby generating opportunities for international business, including from the UK

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw upon the expertise of UK TV professionals so that the Chinese TV sector and relevant Chinese authorities learn a range of new skills, which will enable them to increase their commercial, creative and technical aptitude, enabling them to build capacity. They will build their knowledge and skills to help create an expanding, sustainable and vibrant sector, thereby promoting economic diversification in China and generating opportunities for international businesses, including UK ones.
